Author: Markus#5464
Content: i was before trading alts on btc pairs but its so unreliable, u can have a great setup and then btc pumps or dumps and ur trade setup got fucked up, trading them against usd is more reliable cause if btc pumps most likely u gain in usd aswell

Author: Markus#5464
Content: another thing that is pretty annoying are those shitty CME gaps, if btc dumps or pumps on weekend u will see it return to those prices later on to fill the gaps that were created on the CME chart

Author: joe2x4#5987
Content: Trump and Congress critters removed like to like trading, and demanded taxes on all trades,  and added all kinds of KYC/AML laws. This definitely helped deflate altcoin trades. And in their own words, BTC future contracts helped pop the bubble. https://www.sgtreport.com/2019/11/trump-administration-launched-bitcoin-futures-to-manipulate-price-lower-former-cftc-chair/
